item.description:
My friend James Johnson and his band are playing at Groggy Frog in Southington Saturday night! I put some pictures up of them on this page. Here is their facebook link: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.429208166565.213514.577041565#!/profile.php?id=1676194391

 

If the weather is bad I'm still going regardless so by all means come hang out and watch the band. James fought by my side in Afghanistan and he's family to me so let's go and support them. Groggy Frog is a smaller bar along with being relaxed and low key. Hope to see all of you there! Give me a call or text if you guys have any questions on anything at 860-919-9782.

 

Cheers,

John
item.name: JimmiJack at The Groggy Frog in Southington Saturday Night!
